commandDescription: Dump records in Salesforce org to CSV files for migration usage
objectsFlagDescription: object names to dump, optionally paired with target scope (e.g. Account,Contact,User:related)
outputDirFlagDescription: output directory for dumped CSV files
defaultNamespaceFlagDescription: developer namespace prefix for managed packages
excludeBomFlagDescription: do not prepend byte order mark (\ufeff) in output files
ignoreFieldsFlagDescription: list of object.field path to exclude from dumping (e.g. Account.OwnerId,OpportunityLineItem.TotalPrice)
ignoreSystemDateFlagDescription: exclude system-defined date fields from the dump target (e.g. CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate)
ignoreReadOnlyFlagDescription: exclude non-createable fields from the dump target
